dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5347 IH: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend qualified zone academy bonds for 2 years and to reduce the private business contribution requirement with respect to such bonds, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Kind (for himself and Mr. Kelly of Pennsylvania) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend qualified zone academy bonds for 2 years and to reduce the private business contribution requirement with respect to such bonds, and for other purposes.

section.header: Extension and modification of qualified zone academy bonds

subsection.text: Paragraph (1) of section 54E(c) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking and 2013 and inserting 2013, 2014, and 2015.

subsection.header: Reduction of private business contribution requirement
subsection.text: Subsection (b) of section 54E of such Code is amended by striking 10 percent and inserting 5 percent.
The amendments made by subsections (a) and (b) shall apply to obligations issued after December 31, 2013.

paragraph.text: Clause (iii) of section 6431(f)(3)(A) of such Code is amendedâ€”

subparagraph.text: by striking 2011 and inserting years after 2010, and
by striking of such allocation and inserting of any such allocation.

paragraph.text: The amendments made by this subsection shall take effect as if included in section 310 of the American Taxpayer Relief Act of 2012.
